name: Quizivia
description:
Test your smarts with over 50 questions on general knowledge with more to be added in the future - And if you get an answer wrong, you will find yourself with a funny quirky response to remind you why you should of stayed in school that little bit longer - All in good jest of course. 

This is a very early build to showcase the current state of the game and to garner feedback should anyone leave any.  Currently the game has no music or SFX. 

Game has no exit function just yet - Need to CTRL+ALT+Del and end process in task manager. 

FEATURE PLANS :

  • Escape menu so you can quit the game without task manager - LMAO!
  • Even more questions
  • Quiz categories
  • High Scores on quiz and category quizzes
  • Music and SFX to keep you on your toes.
